summary: Portfolio website with animated Performance Gallery feature in case studies, displaying Meta Ads performance screenshots with professional animations and modal lightbox
architectural_notes: Performance Gallery uses lazy loading for optimized image performance
Modal lightbox system with left/right navigation for multiple images
Scroll-based animations with fade-in and slide-up entrance effects
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Meta Ads performance dashboard screenshot showing VR Health Science campaigns with ₹1.45L total spend, 1.3M impressions, 571K reach, and detailed campaign metrics in tabular format (meta-ads-performance-1.dim_1200x800.png)
- Meta Ads performance dashboard screenshot displaying VR Health Science campaigns with ₹3.48L total spend, 6.3M impressions, 2.1M reach, and campaign breakdown with form leads data (meta-ads-performance-2.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Performance Gallery subsection at the end of Case Study 1 (VRH Derma) that displays 2 Meta Ads performance screenshots showing campaign metrics including ₹1.45L and ₹3.48L total spend, 2.6M and 6.3M impressions, and detailed campaign breakdowns with results, cost per result, reach, and conversion rates
Implement fade-in animation on scroll for Performance Gallery images that triggers when the gallery enters the viewport, with smooth slide-up animation effect synchronized with the fade-in
Add hover effects to Performance Gallery images with subtle 1.03x scale zoom and soft shadow, ensuring the animation is smooth and professional without aggressive motion

Implement modal lightbox functionality that opens when a Performance Gallery image is clicked, with smooth fade transition, darkened background overlay, and left/right navigation arrows to switch between images when multiple images exist

Style the Performance Gallery with the existing green/black/white theme, adding thin black borders around each screenshot, using a 2-column grid layout on desktop and 1-column layout on mobile, maintaining consistency with the portfolio's professional design system
Optimize Performance Gallery images for fast loading using lazy loading, ensuring mobile responsiveness and maintaining performance standards across all viewport sizes
Do not modify the existing case study text content in CaseStudies.tsx, only add the Performance Gallery component and subsection at the end of Case Study 1 (VRH Derma case study)

new_feature_requests.summary: Animated Performance Gallery in Case Study 1 with Meta Ads screenshots, fade-in scroll animations, hover effects, and modal lightbox with navigation
